application.doc: Retrieve the log files for a particular remote syslog forwarding source and instance

param.name: source_name
param.doc: The name of the log source. It can be either webseal or runtime_logs.

param.name: instance_name
param.doc: The name of the log source instance.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve the log files for a particular remote syslog forwarding source and instanceDocker
method.doc: The system provides the ability to forward entries from local log files to a remote syslog server. To retrieve the list of log files for a particular log source and instance, issue a HTTP GET request against the remote syslog forwarding logs resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: sources
param.doc: The name of a log file source.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
